name: image-grayscale
title: Image Grayscale Converter
content:
Overview

This application converts color images to grayscale while preserving all other image properties. Built using Pillow, it provides high-quality grayscale conversion using standard luminance formulas.

Features

  • Convert any color image to grayscale
  • Preserves original dimensions
  • Maintains original file format
  • Optimized quality settings

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a grayscale image with the suffix _grayscale in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating black and white versions for artistic effect
  • Preparing images for document printing
  • Reducing file size by removing color information
  • Preprocessing images for computer vision tasks
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_grayscale.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
